title: Article 109: Amendment to Regulation (EU) 2019/2144 | AI Act Service Desk
text:
```markdown
# Article 109: Amendment to Regulation (EU) 2019/2144

In [Article 11](https://ai-act-service-desk.ec.europa.eu/en/ai-act/article-11) of Regulation (EU) 2019/2144, the following paragraph is added:

“3. When adopting the implementing acts pursuant to paragraph 2, concerning artificial intelligence systems which are safety components within the meaning of Regulation (EU) 2024/1689 of the European Parliament and of the Council[\*](https://ai-act-service-desk.ec.europa.eu/en/ai-act/article-109#ntr*-L_202401689EN.000101-E0065), the requirements set out in Chapter III, Section 2, of that Regulation shall be taken into account.”

View the [official text](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/HTML/?uri=OJ:L_202401689). The text used in this tool is the ‘[Artificial Intelligence Act (Regulation (EU) 2024/1689), Official version of 13 June 2024](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/HTML/?uri=OJ:L_202401689)’.
```
